name: Waves On Mars
description:
This is my 1st ever game so i expect there to be bugs and issues, if this happens please feedback so i can look to fix and impliment changes needed to fix the problems.

It is a simple game i have made in my spare time as my passion is gaming so i really hope you all enjoy it and i will applogise before hand for its lack of AAA polish im new to game development and as such this is a learning passion project for me.

I hope you enjoy this simple wave based shooter.

Have fun 

Thanks Wilo

Special Mentions - I would like to thank Gamedev.tv for support in achieving the goal.
